item.title: Leviathan
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/kuroi-leviathan.jpg'); } MR. SENDA. Wh-what if the rescue ship doesn’t get here by then?! ROBOT. Once oxygen runs out… all the passengers will die. Except for me, of course. MR. SENDA. This is how you handle emergencies around here?! ROBOT. We are a budget spaceline. MR. SENDA. Sometimes it’s best not to tell the truth! A leader’s responsibility is to try and solve problems while keeping quiet about them.
